name: Don't roll out
description:
Don't Roll Out is a puzzle game made for the 2022 gmtk game jam.

The objective is to stay on the dominoes while you take turns with the computer to move over the dominoes path.

At the start of each level you can chose your first position and then on you take turns to move. The computer will chose randomly between the numbers highlighted.

You can see all the moves the computer will take. And you have to plan accordingly.

All the dominoes and computer moves are randomly generated:

Also, the placing of the dominoes follows the rules of the domino game :D
